courses.title: HTML5
courses.description: HTML is the standard markup language for creating Web pages.

courses.title: CSS
courses.description: CSS is the language we use to style an HTML document.(Libraries - BootStrap, TailwindCSS, ShadCnUI)

courses.title: JavaScript
courses.description: JavaScript is the world's most popular programming language.

courses.title: TypeScript
courses.description: TypeScript is JavaScript with added syntax for types..

courses.title: ReactJS
courses.description: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces.(Libraries - Redux, Zustand)

courses.title: NodeJS
courses.description: Node.js is an open source server environment and allow us to to run JavaScript on the server.

courses.title: ExpressJS
courses.description: Express makes the development of Node application very easy and it is very simple to use. It provides a simple and efficient way to build web applications and APIs using JavaScript

courses.title: TailwindCSS
courses.description: Tailwind CSS works by scanning all of your HTML files, JavaScript components, and any other templates for class names, generating the corresponding styles and then writing them to a static CSS file.

courses.title: Git/Github
courses.slug: GitHub allows you to create, store, change, merge, and collaborate on files or code. Any member of a team can access the GitHub repository (think of this as a folder for files) and see the most recent version in real-time. Then, they can make edits or changes that the other collaborators also see
courses.description: GitHub allows you to create, store, change, merge, and collaborate on files or code. Any member of a team can access the GitHub repository (think of this as a folder for files) and see the most recent version in real-time. Then, they can make edits or changes that the other collaborators also see

courses.title: NextJS (Intermediate)
courses.description: Next.js is a React framework that gives you building blocks to create web applications. By framework, we mean Next.js handles the tooling and configuration needed for React, and provides additional structure, features, and optimizations for your application.

courses.title: Socket.IO
courses.description: Socket.IO is a JavaScript library that enables real-time, bidirectional communication between web clients and servers. It is commonly used for building chat applications, live updates, and collaborative platforms, providing event-driven connections over websockets.

courses.title: C#(Intermediate)
courses.description: C# is a modern, object-oriented programming language developed by Microsoft, widely used for building desktop, web, and mobile applications. It is known for its simplicity, versatility, and powerful features like LINQ, async/await, and seamless integration with the .NET framework.

courses.title: .NET Core MVC (Intermediate)
courses.description: .NET Core MVC is a cross-platform framework for building web applications using the Model-View-Controller (MVC) architectural pattern. It provides powerful tools for developing dynamic web applications and APIs with built-in support for routing, authentication, and data binding.
